summary: Slice Labs Inc. is an Insurtech startup providing onDemand insurance to the onDemand economy.Michael is Vice President of Insurance Services and Chief Underwriting Officer responsible for product design and development, actuarial, underwriting, claims and customer service.Michael is a creative and insightful leader with strong entrepreneurial, people and technical skills. Intently focused on clients and the bottom line, Michael produces growth, profit and shareholder value.
